alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 11:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, Wakulla, Gadsden, Liberty, Leon and Franklin Counties through 100 AM EDT/MIDNIGHT CDT/... At 1158 PM EDT/1058 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Quincy to near Port St. Joe. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Midway, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Doak Campbell Stadium, Orange, Franklin, Gretna, Sopchoppy and Lake Bradford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
